name: The Scientist Mila
description:
Game The Scientist Mila is educational game about digestive system for children andproduced by Nawasena team for gamedev competition in DIMAS-TI 2022. 

Nawasena team:

Agus Rian Sirojudin - Leader of Development & Game Programmer

Warda Azzahra - Game Artist

Seni Siti Inayah - Product Manager & Content Designer
